name: lucrum-pos-middleware
description: Simplified POS Middleware for order management with SQLite and WebSocket notifications
author: Usman Younas

scripts.build-installer: npm run build && pkg dist/windows-installer.js --targets node14-win-x64 --output pos-middleware-installer.exe
scripts.build-service-manager: npm run build && pkg dist/service-manager.js --targets node14-win-x64 --output pos-middleware-service-manager.exe
scripts.build-windows: npm run build && npm run build-installer && npm run build-service-manager
